template.description: Use this multi-purpose template to create custom notifications.

contents.variant: Notify Change in Email or Phone to Old one
contents.content: TMVC: Your phone number on file was recently changed. If you made this change, no further action is needed. If not, please log in and secure your account immediately.

contents.subject: Your ${baseUrl} Account Has Been Updated
contents.body:
Online Account Updated
We noticed that your ${baseUrl} account settings have been updated. If you made this change, you don’t need to do anything more. For assistance, please contact us.
©2025 Marriott Vacation Club International. All Rights Reserved. Marriott Vacation Club International and the programs and products provided under the Marriott Vacation Club, Sheraton Vacation Club, and Westin Vacation Club brands are not owned, developed, or sold by Marriott International, Inc. Marriott Vacation Club International uses the Marriott marks under license from Marriott International, Inc. and its affiliates. Contact us at 7812 Palm Parkway, Orlando, FL 32836.

This advertising material is being used for the purpose of soliciting sales of timeshare interests.

Any names and addresses acquired will be used for soliciting sales of timeshare interests.
The complete offering terms are in an offering plan available from Sponsor.
PRIVACY  •  TERMS OF USE
 •  LEGAL DISCLOSURES
  Equal Housing Opportunity

 |  MDC-25-000  |  25-1210-4123080

contents.variant: Notify Change in Email or Phone to Old one
contents.subject: Your Email ID Has Been Successfully Changed
contents.body:
Your Email ID Has Been Successfully Changed
Hello ${givenName},

This is to notify you that the email address associated with your account has been changed. If you made this change, no further action is needed. If you did not request this update, please log in to your account and immediately take steps to secure it.

Thank you for helping us keep your account secure.

©2025 Marriott Vacation Club International. All Rights Reserved. Marriott Vacation Club International and the programs and products provided under the Marriott Vacation Club, Sheraton Vacation Club, and Westin Vacation Club brands are not owned, developed, or sold by Marriott International, Inc. Marriott Vacation Club International uses the Marriott marks under license from Marriott International, Inc. and its affiliates. Contact us at 7812 Palm Parkway, Orlando, FL 32836.

This advertising material is being used for the purpose of soliciting sales of timeshare interests.

Any names and addresses acquired will be used for soliciting sales of timeshare interests.
The complete offering terms are in an offering plan available from Sponsor.
PRIVACY  •  TERMS OF USE
 •  LEGAL DISCLOSURES
  Equal Housing Opportunity

 |  MDC-25-000  |  25-1210-4123080

contents.subject: Your ${baseUrl} Ownership Account Has Been Successfully Connected
contents.body:
Ownership Account(s) Connected
You have successfully connected your ownership account with your ${baseUrl} account. You can now view upcoming stays, make online reservations, pay maintenance fees, and more on your ${baseUrl} account.
©2025 Marriott Vacation Club International. All Rights Reserved. contents.subject: Your Password Has Been Successfully Changed
contents.body:
Your Password Has Been Successfully Changed
Hello ${givenName},

Your account ${username} password has been successfully reset.

If you did not request this change and need assistance, contact us at Owner Services

Thank you for helping us keep your account secure.
©2025 Marriott Vacation Club International. All Rights Reserved. contents.subject: Your Password Reset Information
contents.body:
Reset Your Password
Please click below and follow the prompts to change the password for ${username}. For your protection, this link is for one use only and will remain valid for 24 hours.
RESET PASSWORD
